is a city in Dalarna, Sweden.
and Arlanda Airport (ARN). The easiest way to get into Avesta is either by car or train.

Although Avesta municipality has three train stations, only one is frequently used. The most popular station is Avesta Krylbo, where the train to and from Stockholm stops.

Avesta Krylbo is 15 minutes' walk from the city center. But you don't need to walk, since all the buses within Avesta municipality are free to use.

All train stations are served by the main train company
for connections to Stockholm. The local/regional connections are served by
. Railway tickets can be bought at the SJ website
All tickets are available on both sites.
